inclusion.criterion: willing to participate and sign informed consent
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: either patient or family member can not complete assessments independently
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a severe 'exploding' headache and abnormal vasculature with a draining vein from L temporal lobe consistent with AVM. She refused PT evaluation but was ambulating independently without difficulty.
